title: Iraqi Kurds Gain As Sunni Militants Battle Shiite-Led Baghdad
teaser: Kurds in Iraq's north already have a lot of autonomy from Baghdad and are looking to make more gains.
contentencoded:
Kurds in Iraq’s north already have a lot of autonomy from Baghdad and are looking to make more gains as Sunni militants press the country’s Shiite-led government.

Financial Times reporter Erika Solomon joins Here & Now’s Robin Young from Erbil, the capital of Iraq’s Kurdish region.

Guest

  • Erika Solomon, Middle East-based journalist, writing for the Financial Times. She tweets @ErikaSolomon.
